Imparfait (Imperfect).J'embrassais: I used to kiss / I used to embrace
Imparfait (Imperfect).Tu embrassais: You used to kiss / You used to embrace
Imparfait (Imperfect).Il/Elle embrassait: He/She used to kiss / He/She used to embrace
Imparfait (Imperfect).Nous embrassions: We used to kiss / We used to embrace
Imparfait (Imperfect).Vous embrassiez: You used to kiss / You used to embrace (formal)
Imparfait (Imperfect).Ils/Elles embrassaient: They used to kiss / They used to embrace

Futur simple (Simple Future).J'embrasserai: I will kiss / I will embrace
Futur simple (Simple Future).Tu embrasseras: You will kiss / You will embrace
Futur simple (Simple Future).Il/Elle embrassera: He/She will kiss / He/She will embrace
Futur simple (Simple Future).Nous embrasserons: We will kiss / We will embrace
Futur simple (Simple Future).Vous embrasserez: You will kiss / You will embrace (formal)
Futur simple (Simple Future).Ils/Elles embrasseront: They will kiss / They will embrace
